title: RITO WHY DO YOU DO THIS TO ME HUH?!
body: FIRST IT WAS 1 RP AWAY FROM A SKIN, THEN IT WAS 1 CHARACTER AWAY FROM A NAME T.T PLS LET US HAVE 1 MORE CHARACTER ADDED INTO OUR SUMMONER NAME CHANGE

replies.body: Sorry, but you cannot have xXxSwag420TeemoItXxX as a name!
When I mean character I meant one more letter, I wanted a name that was 1 character too long...
